Package display

Class Display

java.lang.Object
display.Display
Direct Known Subclasses:
CovidTracker, Inventory, Map, Menu, Tier, TimerDisplay
public abstract class Display
extends java.lang.Object
The Display class represents an object that is displayed on the window
Author:
roshnibright

  • Constructor Details

    • Display

      public Display​(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a Display
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the start point
      y - y-coordinate of the start point
      width - width of the displayed element
      height - height of the displayed element

    • Display

      public Display​(double x, double y, double width, double height, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color strokeColor, java.awt.Color fillColor)
      Creates a Display with specified colors
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the start point
      y - y-coordinate of the start point
      width - width of the displayed element
      height - height of the displayed element
      strokeWeight - weight of the stroke to draw the displayed element
      strokeColor - color of the stroke to draw the displayed element
      fillColor - inner color of the displayed element

  • Method Details

    • insideRect

      public static boolean insideRect​(float clickX, float clickY, float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Tests whether or not the user clicked on a rectangle
      Parameters:
      clickX - the x-coordinate of the location where clicked
      clickY - the y-coordinate of the location where clicked
      x - x-coordinate of the start of the rectangle
      y - y-coordinate of the start of the rectangle
      width - width of the rectangle
      height - height of the rectangle
      Returns:
      whether the clicked coordinate is inside the given dimensions for a rectangle
